name: Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'all-purpose flour or cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'shredded Swiss cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'shredded Gruyère cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound) loaf', 'name': 'French bread, cut into 1 inch cubes'}

name: Best Formula Three-Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry white wine (such as Sauvignon Blanc)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'Gruyère cheese, shredded'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'Emmentaler cheese, shredded'}
steps: Heat wine in a small saucepan over low heat until simmering.. Meanwhile, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Whisk in flour until a thick paste forms. Whisk in wine until mixture is smooth. Gradually stir in Gruyère, Cheddar, and Emmentaler cheese until melted, about 5 minutes.. Transfer cheese mixture into fondue pot. Keep warm over a low flame.

name: Beer Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Swiss cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, halved'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle', 'name': 'beer'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)'}
steps: Combine Cheddar cheese, Swiss cheese, flour, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.. Rub cut side of garlic clove around bottom and sides of fondue pot.. Pour beer into fondue pot and slowly bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, about 5 minutes.. Gradually stir cheese mixture into beer, adding small amounts at a time, until cheese is melted and blended, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in hot pepper sauce.

name: Cheddar-Beer Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'shredded sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lager beer'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'mustard powder'}
steps: Mix Cheddar cheese and flour together in a bowl.. Bring beer to a light boil in a fondue pot; add garlic, Worcestershire sauce, and mustard powder and stir. Gradually stir cheese mixture into beer mixture. Reduce heat to low; cook and stir mixture until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

name: Basic Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and crushed'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}
steps: Mix together milk, flour, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, and garlic in a medium saucepan over low heat. Heat until almost boiling.. Gradually stir in Cheddar cheese. Continue heating until all the cheese has melted.. Keep the mixture warm and melted in a fondue dish.

name: Parmesan Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'Neufchatel cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'small loaf French bread, cut into cubes'}
steps: Stir Neufchatel cream cheese in milk in a saucepan over medium-low heat until melted, 2 to 3 minutes. Add Parmesan cheese and garlic salt. Cook and stir until the Parmesan melts, 2 to 3 minutes more. Serve with bread cubes.

name: Classic Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'dry white wine (such as Sauvignon Blanc)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'kirsch (cherry brandy)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, slightly crushed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'freshly grated nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Gruyère cheese'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Emmentaler cheese'}

name: Crab Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Swiss cheese'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Snow Crab clusters, shelled and chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'snipped fresh parsley'}
steps: Melt cream cheese and wine together in an electric fondue pot or saucepan over low heat, stirring constantly until smooth, about 5 minutes.. Toss Swiss cheese with cornstarch in a bowl to coat. Stir into wine mixture with crabmeat, milk, Worcestershire, and parsley until the cheese is smooth and crab is heated thoroughly, 5 to 10 minutes. Transfer to a fondue pot if not using already, or chafing dish; keep warm.

name: Easy Pizza Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, finely minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'ground beef'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(15 ounce) cans', 'name': 'pizza sauce'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese, or more to taste'}
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute onion in hot oil until soft and translucent, 4 to 6 minutes.. Heat a large pot over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.. Stir beef, onion, and pizza sauce together in the same pot over medium-high heat. Add mozzarella cheese and Cheddar cheese one handful at a time, stirring until cheeses melt into the fondue before adding the next handfuls. Ladle fondue into bowls.

name: Classic Swiss Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Gruyère cheese'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Emmental cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, halved'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 inch)', 'name': 'French bread, cubed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'cooked baby potatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cornichons'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pickled pearl onions'}
steps: Combine Gruyère cheese, Emmental cheese, and cornstarch in a bowl. Mix until the cheese is evenly coated. Set aside.. Rub the cut side of the garlic all over the inside of a fondue pot or heavy saucepan. Add wine and place over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, then gradually add cheese and cornstarch mixture. Stir with a spatula, gently stirring in a figure-of-eight motion, until all of the cheese is added and the fondue is smooth and homogenous. Reduce heat to medium-low if the fondue is boiling too vigorously.. Immediately serve fondue, preferably over a warmer. If you used a saucepan on the stove to heat the fondue, you can carefully transfer the fondue to a fondue pot to serve.

name: Tarek's Irish Stout Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ⅛', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded extra-sharp white Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '1 ⅛', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded Swiss cheese'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'freshly shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle', 'name': 'Irish stout beer (such as Guinness®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'steak sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'hot pepper sauce (such as Cholula®)'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Combine white Cheddar cheese, Swiss cheese, Parmesan cheese, and cornstarch together in a bowl; set aside.. Stir Irish stout beer, steak sauce, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, hot pepper sauce, and mustard powder together in a fondue pot; set heat under fondue pot to medium.. Stir cheese mixture, 1/2 cup at a time, into stout beer mixture in fondue pot until cheese is completely melted and the fondue is thick and smooth. Do not let the fondue boil.. Season with black pepper to taste.

name: Quick Fontina Cheese Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chicken stock'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'shredded fontina cheese'}
steps: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat until a pinch of flour sprinkled into the oil will just begin to bubble. Whisk in flour to form a thick paste the consistency of cake frosting. Continue cooking, whisking constantly, until flour has turned golden and begins to smell like toast, about 20 minutes. Whisk in wine, mustard, and cayenne.. Mix heavy whipping cream into the flour-butter mixture; cook and stir until thickened, about 5 minutes. Add fontina cheese; stir until melted, about 1 minute. Transfer to a fondue pot.

name: Chef John's Classic Cheese Fondue Is the Ultimate Cheese Lover's Recipe
Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies and Brie Fondue
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) package', 'name': "Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage, divided"}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine (sweet like Riesling)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) wheel', 'name': 'Brie cheese, rind removed and cheese diced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'shredded sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Dash of salt and pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apples, cored and thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'French baguette, sliced 1/4 inch thick and toasted'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Honey for drizzling'}
steps: Chop 8 Lit'l Smokies smoked sausages and reserve the rest. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, heat chopped smoked sausages in olive oil with garlic until just browned.. Add white wine and milk. In a separate bowl, toss the brie and Cheddar cheeses with flour, thoroughly coat. Slowly whisk cheese mixture into the saucepan. Continue to whisk until smooth and thick, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.. Saute the remaining smoked sausages in a skillet until browned. Serve warm fondue with Lit'l Smokies smoked sausages, apple slices and toasted baguette. Drizzle fondue and apples with honey.

name: YouTube + Chill: For Serious Cheese-Lovers Only
